Room.Name: Gladitor Champion's Arena
Room.ShortDescription: This part of the arena is made for champions.
Room.LongDescription: Only the champions from previous fights are allowed in here, and this is the part of the arena that is the most packed with blood-thirsty crowds. There is bloody sawdust on the floor, and a few pieces of bodies that were not picked up when the cleaning crew was at work. Remember, your opponent has already won all of his previous fights.
